game_physics

Class CoCircle

  • java.lang.Object
    • game_physics.CoCircle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CollisionBox

    public class CoCircle
extends java.lang.Object
implements CollisionBox
    The class CoCircle represents the circle type of CollisionBox.This is good solution for the circle images.It represents the circle around the sprite.
    See Also:
    CollisionBox
